description: Chibiki Tatsuji was the homeroom teacher of Class 3-3 in 1972, the "first year", when Yomiyama Misaki died. Kouichi`s late mother Ritsuko was also one of his students. He resigned teaching soon after, but remained at Yomiyama North working as the librarian. He has since chronicled the grisly phenomenon afflicting Class 3-3, sharing his findings with Kouichi and Mei.
name: Chibiki Tatsuji
